content: Hello, I noticed that the FHIR profile for the GCS was missing from the Nictiz STU Zib 2017 package. What is the status of this Zib/HCIM? Will it be available in the STU3 and R4 versions?

Hi @Daniel Puttmann,
That's correct. Until now, profiles were only created when used in a use case, and at the moment there isn't any use case that includes GCS. For zib release 2020 all zibs will be profiled (in FHIR R4), so this will include GCS. This is ungoing work however.

Aha, thank you for the information. I am working with an ICU dataset, and it would be very useful to have this profile. For now I will use a customized Observation profile. When the GCS profile is released with the FHIR R4 profiles, I'll try to switch over. Thanks!
Daniel Puttmann has marked this topic as resolved.
